title: ePSXe 2.0.2-1 + all plugins, bios, memcards + editor, pec, etc
description:
ePSXe 2.0.2-1


ALL plugins (including some you might not have heard of and some hard to find)

ALL bios

memory cards and memory card editor (delete saves, transfer saves, etc)

PEC (psx emulation cheater) emulates gameshark, code breaker, action replay

also includes actual gameshark action replay and code breaker virtual images/iso's




INSTALLATION:
get 7-zip or winrar (or any extraction utility)
right click "ePSXe202-1.7z" and a dropdown menu will appear
move mouse cursor over "7-zip" and another dropdown will appear
select either "extract files" or "extract here" either option works just fine

a new folder should appear with the extracted content, open it, run epsxe.exe
a config menu will appear, follow the instructions, get setup
then at the top menu on the emu, select "run" then "run iso"
find and select your game
play

for the configuration the bios say recommended next to the name, use that one.
graphics i used pete's OpenGL2 2.9
sound i used any p.e.o.ps options
the rest doesn't really matter that much, so select whatever
configure the gamepad controls you want to use.


ENJOY and keep an eye out, i will be uploading a online playable zombie game with nearly a thousand online maps to play. "land of the dead" it will be and extract and play, fully updated and everything installed for you
